items.badge_description: It's time to give bottle shops some love by adding them as your purchased location. That's 135 check-ins with a purchased location! Tag 5 more to get to Level 28.

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 115 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 24!

Traditionally brewed in the Nord-Pas-de-Calais region of France, Bière de Garde is a style meant to be aged, so don’t rush it! That's 5 different beers with the style of Bière de Garde or Bière de Mars. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 290 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 59!
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 205 check-ins with a photo.

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 77)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 78!
Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 10 different Pilsners. Try 5 more to unlock level 3.

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 425 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 86!

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

What happens when you take two or more amazing breweries, throw them into the tank and let them ferment together? An amazing collaboration beer, that’s what! Cheers to working together to create the perfect flavor. That's 20 different beers that have been brewed as a collaboration. Try 5 more for Level 5!

items.badge_name: Beyond a Shadow of a Stout (Level 10)
items.badge_description: We all love Stouts, and now we have a dedicated badge to celebrate your dedication to these dark, top-fermented beer in multiple variations, like Oatmeal, Milk and more! Which one will you start with? That's 50 different beers with the style of Stout. Try 5 more for Level 11!
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 200 check-ins with a photo.

When a single isn’t enough, make it a double. Doubling the hops and malts in a recipe results in a higher ABV and can pack quite a boozey punch. That's 45 different beers with the style that contains Imperial / Double in its style name. Try 5 more for Level 10!

At first taste, dark ales can be overwhelming for even the most skilled of beer drinkers, but your will is weak and with time you will eventually turn to the dark side. That's 10 different beers with the style of Dark Ale, Belgian Strong Dark Ale, Lager - Euro Dark, Lager - Dark, IPA - Black / Cascadian Dark Ale or IPA - Imperial / Double Black.. Try 5 more for Level 3!

Ahoy schwarz-buckler! Beware of the evil Black Beerd, as you sail the dark sea of suds matey. That's 5 different beers with style of Schwarzbier, Lager - Dark, or Lager - Euro Dark. Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 75)

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 120 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 25!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 205 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 42!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 415 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 84!

November 29th is Small Brewery Sunday! Inside, outside, or curbside … let’s support the indie craft breweries that are making this crazy year just a little bit better — one delicious craft beer at a time
It's New Brew Thursday! Drink any beer you have never had before on three different Thursdays in a 20 day period.

Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 5 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 7!

Porters and Stouts are rich with both history and flavor. Roasty, dark, and delicious, these two styles helped start it all. That’s 75 different beers with the style of Porter or Stout. Try 5 more for Level 16!

International Stout Day is on November 5th and along with it, a worldwide celebration of one of the styles that truly helped shape the world of beer, the Stout! This rich and full bodied style has a long history well worth raising a toast to.

items.checkin_comment: A great beer for a great assistant to the regional manager (*Asistant Regional Manager) and safety officer

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 275 check-ins at venue that is verified.  Try 5 more for Level 56!

Cheers to 10 years of Untappd! From a small idea hatched in 2010 to connect people with their next favorite beer, we've reached this amazing milestone thanks to you, Untappd Community. We wouldn't be here without your support and your love for beer. Here's to the next 10! We'll see you this Saturday, October 24th for our 10th Anniversary Virtual Celebration. Click here for all the details!
